item.title: Juniper Has Routers For The 100 Gbps WAN
item.description:
Verizon and Juniper are partnering on a large-scale project to implement 100 Gbps fiber optic connections to meet the increasing demand for faster internet speeds. While carriers have experimented with 100 Gbps transmission, which is significantly faster than the typical 10 Gbps long-haul networks, it seems that widespread adoption is on the horizon. Juniper has developed an interface capable of handling this bandwidth directly, eliminating the need for carriers to combine multiple links...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/juniper-has-routers-for-the-100-gbps-wan/
